title: Passage on survival of the free world - led to

content.question: Which of the following United States actions most directly resulted from the goals expressed in the excerpt?

choices.label: Intervention in the conflict in Korea
Application of federal power to try to end poverty
Investigations to find communist subversives in government jobs

content.answer: Intervention in the conflict in Korea

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
